response:
My dear husband, I am so relieved that the court has acquitted me of all charges. It was a long and difficult process, but in the end, justice prevailed and my innocence was proven. I am blameless and cleared of any wrongdoing. - White

I know you didn't do it, my love. You are guilt-free and innocent. The real perpetrator will be caught in the act and brought to justice. - White

As your partner, I stand by you through thick and thin. You are not at fault and did not commit any crime. I believe in your innocence and know that you are wrongfully accused. - White

My love, I know you didn't do it. You are innocent and guilt-free. The evidence clearly shows that you are not the perpetrator. - White

I am so proud of you for being strong and persevering through this difficult time. Your innocence has been proven, and now we can move on with our lives. - White
